The below list includes the registered office address, country of incorporation, tax residency (if tax domiciled outside of the country of incorporation) and the percentage of equity owned by Glencore as at 31 December 2022.

This list includes entities were we have concluded agreements to dispose of the entities but where such transactions have not yet closed. Entities that are in the process of liquidation are excluded.
